Sadly, the women who support Trump simply don't want to progress. They like being pregnant and in the kitchen, standing by their dispicable, bigoted men. Because, you know, if being downtrodden, inhibited, and controlled by American patriarchy was good enough for them, it's good enough for their backward, misguided offspring.

If anything was going to be done, it would have been done by now. She is going to be the nominee for president. The FBI is not going to do a damn thing to her. The only thing stupid Americans want is the first woman president. Just like they wanted the first black president. They don't focus on the first really qualified president.
